text: ITC Kristen is a casual script typeface consisting of two weights designed by George Ryan for the International Typeface Corporation (ITC). It was inspired by a handwritten menu at a Cambridge, Massachusetts restaurant, and has an asymmetric structure suggesting a child's handwriting. A TrueType version of Kristen is shipped with Microsoft Publisher 2000. ==See also== *Comic Sans *Chalkboard (typeface) == References == ==External links== *ITC page *Microsoft page Category:International Typeface Corporation typefaces Category:Casual script typefaces
title: ITC Kristen
